name: The Caligula Effect: Overdose
description: Mobius. An idyllic world that lets people forget about the pain and problems of reality. Created by a sentient vocaloid program, Î¼ (Mu), reality and fantasy have become blurred, allowing people to relive their high school years in bliss -- but just how real is a virtual happiness?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit or later Processor: Dual-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 GTS or AMD Radeon 6770 HD DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space Additional Notes: 3D Resolution Scale at 50%
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit or later Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space Additional Notes: 3D Resolution Scale at 100%
